Our Rooms & Suites

We offer a wide range of amenities to make your stay comfortable and memorable.

24/7 Fitness Center

Our state-of-the-art fitness center is equipped with cardio machines, free weights, and everything you need for a full-body workout, available any time of day.

On-Site Dining

Enjoy delicious meals at our signature restaurant, offering a menu of locally-sourced ingredients. Or, unwind with a craft cocktail at our elegant lobby bar.

The Central Park Hotel

Experience luxury and comfort in the heart of the city. The Central Park Hotel offers premium amenities, stunning views, and unparalleled service.
